name: Birbs of War
description:
Set down your stakes, build a town, defend what's yours! In this GM48 prototype you guide your birbs in a hostile wilderness as others jealous of your success try to destroy your home.

As this is an unfinished prototype (and won't be finished unless overwhelming demand calls for it) you start with more resources than you need. Enjoy the gameplay, and if you hit a bug, well... have fun!

This game was meant to be projected with a polar viewpoint, so you appeared to be walking around a globe which looped back on itself, which obviously was not finished.

Controls:

  • Left/Right -> A/D
  • Right Mouse Button -> Interact/Attack
  • Escape -> Quit
  • Delete -> Restart
